messages.title: Your Labour Candidate
messages.content: Jonny grew up in this area and went to school here before studying PPE at Oxford. After a spell working in Parliament, Jonny decided to leave London again to dedicate himself to improving our area.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Labour's plan for a better housing
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour has a better plan for housing that will deliver 200,000 homes a year by 2020, give locals the first call on new homes in the area, get 16-24 year olds on the housing ladder and put first-time buyers first.

housing.content: Labour has a better plan for housing that will deliver 200,000 homes a year by 2020, give locals the first call on new homes in the area, get 16-24 year olds on the housing ladder and put first-time buyers first.

leaflet.personalStatement: Jonny grew up in this area and went to school here before studying PPE at Oxford. After a spell working in Parliament, Jonny decided to leave London again to dedicate himself to improving our area.
leaflet.additionalNotes: NEWBURY & THATCHAM DESERVE BETTER THAN THIS
